name: Rocky (itch) (michaelsmiley)
description:
Get ready to rumble in a homage that combines classic arcade boxing gameplay with the best series of boxing movies. Play through the original saga going the distance against classic opponents like Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang and Ivan Drago.

But that's not all, unlock special matches against foes such as Pauly, Thunderlips and more.

And remember, it ain't about how hard you hit, it's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.

Featuring

  • Classic fights from the series
  • Keyboard and Touch controls
  • Movie defining training sessions
